name: Declutter Series - GetFreeEbooks
description: Removes adverts and useless buttons. Faithful in style to unmodified GetFreeBooks, compatible with most other themes. Part of the Declutter Series.

user.name: Herossaumure
user.about: I am gradually learning HTML5 and CSS by making styles and websites. Visit my testing page: Testing Site for HTML (tumblr) Contact me: Herossaumure (tumblr) Herossaumure (reddit)

additional_info:
Items removed:
  • Side bars full of adverts
  • Top bars full of adverts
  • Top bar links to rarely-used pages
  • Adverts in the page flow
